name: Infinite Pew-Pew: The Arcade
description:
A Galaga inspired game made for the gamedev.tv game jam with unreal 5. My first jam and it was absolutaly amazing. Waiting for my free course:)

Source/Ue5 Project files:https://www.dropbox.com/s/qj8sof13sr1zt3z/Infinite%20Pew%20Pew%20The%20Arcade.zi...

Wasd to move

Left mouse button to shoot

Right mouse button to torpedo.

Left stick to move

Right trigger to shoot

Left trigger to torpedo

Sry but i didnt have the time to make the menus work with controller. Pls use a mouse there:)
